about_the_game:
Temporal Cross

game Introduction

In a complex timeline where history and the future are intertwined, ancient creatures are stirring from beneath the earth, ready to awaken. This game combines card drafting, Roguelike, and tactical chess elements, allowing you to travel through various dimensions to correct historical errors or watch as enemies wreak havoc. But fear not, you are no longer alone. Command over 30 unique characters, turn foes into allies, and explore different regions together.

game Features

  • Freedom and Danger：Card acquisition and deck building seem easier, allowing for extensive collection and strategic adjustments, but be mindful of your budget. Optimize your deck, strategize, and prepare for the unknown.
  • Card Diversity：Three primary colors and four suits offer a rich array of tactical options. Blue utility cards allow for flexible responses to changes in battle conditions; red attack cards help you annihilate enemies; green skill cards or artifact cards are mysterious and full of potential.
  • Dynamic Tactical Maps：Staying still puts you at a disadvantage as enemy assaults close in. Move strategically to include enemies within your range, manage your attack and defense plans flexibly, and avoid getting cut off after an overly aggressive pursuit.
  • Choose Your Allies Wisely：Character combinations are crucial and can be alternated in battle, adding variety to the combat. Characters need rest after being knocked down, so balance risk and reward and try different combinations to unlock their true potential.

game Content

  • Over 30 initial characters and numerous hidden characters unlockable throughout the game, enhancing strategic diversity.
  • Dynamic tactical maps with unique strategic challenges, requiring players to continuously adapt their tactics to different battle environments.
  • Over 200 different cards, including two unique green skill cards for each character, along with various utility and attack cards.
  • Artifact and elemental cards that provide special abilities and additional strategic options, allowing players to turn the tide at critical moments.
  • Dozens of unknown events that trigger randomly during gameplay, bringing unexpected challenges and rewards to players.

  • OS: win7/win10

  • Graphics: NVDIA GTX 960 / AMD RADEON R9 280

short_description: Combine tactical chess and card gameplay for a unique roguelike strategy experience. Choose from over 30 unique characters, refine your deck, challenge bosses, and discover endless possibilities. Each card color triggers unique attribute interactions, unveiling hidden events for new adventures!
